name: transform-keys
description: Recursively transform the keys of an object

scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && tslint -c ./tslint.json ./src/**/*  --format stylish && tsc --project tsconfig.json && cp package.json ./dist/package.json && cp package-lock.json ./dist/package-lock.json && echo build done! || echo  build failed

author: gonza-lito <gonzalo.romano@gmail.com>
